name: What time is it? Clock 4 kids
name_original: What time is it? Clock 4 kids
description:
"What time is it?" helps kids to learn how to read clock and tell time.

NEW: 2 new bonus levels helps to learn 24 hours and time in day and at night.

Fourteen levels with increasing difficulty allow a child to get familiar with the clock and how time "works". Funny "talking" clock says what time it shows and provide a variety of exercises to the learning material.

The clock can "speak" following languages: English (computer voice, if your device supports it), German (computer voice), Spanish (computer voice), Portuguese (computer voice) and Russian.

It also very helpful for learning of foreign languages such Spanish, German or Portuguese.

This full version contains:
  - all fourteen levels (from simple presentations of minute and hour hands to understanding of "half past one", "quarter to five" and the time difference)
  - no ads
  - no "in-app" products
